001package io.github.ai4ci.output;
002
003import org.immutables.value.Value;
004
005import io.github.ai4ci.config.execution.ExecutionConfiguration;
006import io.github.ai4ci.config.setup.SetupConfiguration;
007
008/**
009 * Execution and setup configuration snapshot exported at execution start.
010 *
011 * <p>
012 * Main purpose: capture the full setup and execution configuration used for a
013 * simulation execution. Records are produced at the START stage and are written
014 * per execution as JSON serialisable objects; the immutable type may be
015 * included alongside CSV outputs for reproducibility.
016 *
017 * <p>
018 * Downstream uses: used to reproduce experiments, for auditing and for
019 * supplying configuration metadata to analysis pipelines.
020 *
021 * @author Rob Challen
022 */
023@Value.Immutable
024public interface OutbreakConfigurationJson extends CommonCSV.Execution {
025
026        /**
027         * Get the execution configuration used to run the outbreak.
028         *
029         * @return the execution configuration instance describing runtime policies,
030         *         testing and inâ€‘host model selection
031         */
032        public ExecutionConfiguration getExecutionConfiguration();
033
034        /**
035         * Get the setup configuration used to create the outbreak.
036         *
037         * @return the setup configuration instance describing population and network
038         *         generation parameters
039         */
040        public SetupConfiguration getSetupConfiguration();
041
042}
